StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateMCFIPFAPTAP]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @ProgramType char(1), @SubmitDate date.me = NULL, @EnrollmentDate date.me = NULL, @DisenrollmentDate date.me = NULL, @AgreementDate date.me = NULL, @EnrollmentYears int = NULL, @CumAmountPaid int = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIP_FAP_TAP WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND PROGRAM_TYPE = @ProgramType AND ENROLLMENT_YEARS = CASE WHEN @ProgramType IN ('A', 'T') THEN @EnrollmentYears ELSE ENROLLMENT_YEARS END) BEGIN --- UPDATE MCFIP/FAP/TAP DATA
UPDATE FIP_FAP_TAP SET SUBMIT_DATE = @SubmitDate, ENROLLMENT_DATE = @EnrollmentDate, DISENROLLMENT_DATE = @DisenrollmentDate, AGREEMENT_DATE = @AgreementDate, ENROLLMENT_YEARS = @EnrollmentYears, CUMULATIVE_AMOUNT_PAID = @CumAmountPaid, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND PROGRAM_TYPE = @ProgramType AND ENROLLMENT_YEARS = CASE WHEN @ProgramType IN ('A', 'T') THEN @EnrollmentYears ELSE ENROLLMENT_YEARS END
END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT MCFIP/FAP/TAP DATA INSERT INTO FIP_FAP_TAP (CONTRACT_ID, PROGRAM_TYPE, SUBMIT_DATE, ENROLLMENT_DATE, DISENROLLMENT_DATE, AGREEMENT_DATE, ENROLLMENT_YEARS, CUMULATIVE_AMOUNT_PAID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@ContractID, @ProgramType, @SubmitDate, @EnrollmentDate, @DisenrollmentDate, @AgreementDate, @EnrollmentYears, @CumAmountPaid, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
